page.title: 17PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {TIG} In Tig ten people or more can play. Someone is 'it'and the person who is it has to tig <touch> you. {WARS} About 20 people can play.What you do is try and shoot the people on the opposite side with pretend guns. {BULLDOG Any number of people can play.It has simple rules: Never run if you are not picked and all of you run when 'bulldog' is called,always run to the opposite side once you are out of the circle. {BASE 1,2,3 One person is'it'.they count to 50 and then look for the rest of the players (who by now have hidden).If the person who is it sees a hider then he says base 1,2,3 see (the person he sees>. The hider has to get to counting spot.
